footer.p: The [b]DataGrid[/b] allows the values of multiple nodes of the type to be compared and edited.

Would you like to know more? [url=/Controls/ImageMap.xaml#SprueKit.QuickGuide.Properties.xml]Properties[/url], [url=/Controls/ImageMap.xaml#SprueKit.QuickGuide.Permutations.xml]Permutations[/url], and [url=/Controls/ImageMap.xaml#SprueKit.QuickGuide.History.xml]Undo/Redo[/url]

section.name: ObjectType
section.p: Use the drop-down box to select the type of object to view in the [b]DataGrid[/b].

section.name: Sorting
section.p: Many fields can be sorted in ascending or descending order. Text, single numbers, options, and checkboxes can be sorted.

section.name: Editing
section.p: To edit the value of a field in the [b]DataGrid[/b] double-click on the cell.
Some fields like checkboxes and drop-down lists do not require double-clicking and can be used in place.
